segments.text: I see the boy is quite clever, using that stool to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The "COOKIE JAR" is clearly labeled, leaving no doubt about his objective.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand right in there, probably grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing next to him is just adorable, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, as if she's ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this little secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of childhood pranks and forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of their delightful mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost funny how oblivious she is to the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being very quiet and stealthy, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get caught, or if they'll make it out with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little moment of shared conspiracy is quite sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They certainly seem determined to get their reward.
segments.speaker: PAR
